title: Display energy consumption / carbon impact to users
subHeader: Incorporate carbon-aware design into the service by displaying carbon usage to the user on pages/apps.

guidance.guidanceText01: When users interact with a service, there will be associated energy consumption and thus carbon footprint. In order to raise users' general awareness of the impacts of a particular interaction, the carbon impact should be made visible. This will create general service-wide transparency, build trust and will also help keep the carbon footprint in the mind when designing and providing services.
